# relapseRisk

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

R package for predicting risk of relapse for anorexia nervosa recovery. UNDER CONSTRUCTION.

[EPSI_thetaAnalysis](./EPSI_thetaAnalysis.html) contains an overview of the initial analysis that led to the construction of this package. 

[fullAnalysis](./fullAnalysls.html) contains the analysis on the training data that was used to construct the machine learning algorithm which predicts the risk of relapse for patients diagnosed with anorexia nervosa.
